attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The man is a legend. His charity work goes without saying.  He is one of the few left that have been the backbone of Britain's entertaiment over the decades.  The Generation Game, Sunday night at the Palladium, Strictly Come Dancing, the list is endless.  Please support this petition.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
